text: avarige nuhâ€Œra sangatiyannu odi kelisiri. Avaru tam'ma janangadodane helidaru; nanna janangadavare, nanna astitva hagu allahana vacanagala mulaka nanu nimage niduttiruva upadesavu nimage tumba bharavaguttiddare (nimage tilidirali;) nanantu allahanalli bharavase ittiddene. Nivu mattu (devatvadallina) nim'ma paludararu seri (nanna virud'dha) nim'ma yojaneyannu pakvagolisiri. Nim'ma yojaneyalli nimage yavude gondala uliyadirali. A balika nivu nanna virud'dha karyacaranege iliyiri. Nanage nivu yavude kalavakasavannu kodabedi
